acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns._0: cumulative price of target token regardless of pair order

getPrice(address).custom:error: Missing error is thrown if the token config does not existRange error is thrown if TWAP price is not greater than zero

params.accessControlManager_: Address of the access control manager contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setTokenConfig((address,uint256,address,.custom:error: Range error is thrown if anchor period is not greater than zeroRange error is thrown if base unit is not greater than zeroValue error is thrown if base unit decimals is not the same as asset decimalsNotNullAddress error is thrown if address of asset is nullNotNullAddress error is thrown if PancakeSwap pool address is null
setTokenConfig((address,uint256,address,.custom:event: Emits TokenConfigAdded event if new token config are added with asset address, PancakePool address, anchor period address

setTokenConfigs((address,uint256,address.custom:error: Zero length error thrown, if length of the config array is 0

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

updateTwap(address).custom:error: Missing error is thrown if token config does not exist

returns._0: anchorPrice anchor price of the asset

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

AnchorPriceUpdated(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Emit this event when TWAP price is updated

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

TokenConfigAdded(address,address,uint256.notice: Emit this event when new token configs are added

TwapWindowUpdated(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Emit this event when TWAP window is updated

BNB_ADDR().notice: Set this as asset address for BNB. This is the underlying for vBNB

BNB_BASE_UNIT().notice: the base unit of WBNB and BUSD, which are the paired tokens for all assets

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

constructor.notice: Constructor for the implementation contract. Sets immutable variables.

currentCumulativePrice((address,uint256,.notice: Fetches the current token/WBNB and token/BUSD price accumulator from PancakeSwap.

getPrice(address).notice: Get the TWAP price for the given asset

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the owner of the contract

observations(address,uint256).notice: Keeps a record of token observations mapped by address, updated on every updateTwap invocation.

setTokenConfigs((address,uint256,address.notice: Adds multiple token configs at the same time

updateTwap(address).notice: Updates the current token/BUSD price from PancakeSwap, with 18 decimals of precision.

windowStart(address).notice: Observation array index which probably falls in current anchor period mapped by asset address

userdoc.notice: This oracle fetches price of assets from PancakeSwap.
